review: Fire TV Stick works fine and is easy to set up. Purchased to watch Prime shows. Seems like most are very old or B grade movies. Many times you are referred to purchase or rent on Amazon because desired content is not rated PRIME. Can't make the iPhone 6+ app connect/pair with the Stick and can't find a good source for assistance.
author: David L. Ellis "Dellis80134"

review: Love Amazon Prime, Fire stick loads right up, connected to WiFi with no problems. Second one I bought for another TV.
author: John R Foglia

review: pretty amazing device, specially for the 20 bucks I paid.I was able to side load kodi on it too and that ran reasonably well, a bit underpowered for HD but mostly ok otherwise for 720p

review: easy to hook up and more games and movies  for the grandchildren.  Life is good.

review: Once I got it setup, I really like it. Setup was frustrating because of entry of email and password and no correction button. Love the use of it once it was understood. I would really recommend that people purchase the voice controlled remote.
author: LadyJane

review: The fire stick was easy to plug in. We do need to increase the speed of our internet router as movies are delayed for downloading.
author: Roberta A. Manis

review: I feel that this might be great if directions on use would have come with it. I have a cable channel selector and the one that came with the stick doesn't work with the other one. I can't get anything to come up when I hit options. I see that Netflex is there and a few other ones but it is not letting me access them. Not really happy with the stick. I am not mechanically gifted so I wish there were more instructions with it.
